variants.name: copy_user_modules
variants.description: Copy user modules directory instead linking

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: mofem-cephas
dependencies.description: MoFEM is finite element core library

dependencies.name: mofem-users-modules
dependencies.description:
MofemUsersModules creates installation environment for user-provided
modules and extends of mofem-cephas package. For more information how to
work with Spack and MoFEM see
http://mofem.eng.gla.ac.uk/mofem/html/install_spack.html
